attributes.action: The Government should provide aid for those suffering in the Yemen crisis.
attributes.additional_details: The Yemen crisis is the largest humanitarian crisis in the world. Children are being robbed of their futures and thousands of people are struggling to get the healthcare and resources they need.
attributes.background: The Government should provide humanitarian aid to those suffering in the Yemen crisis. The Government should donate money, food and resources to help organisations who are working on the ground to provide aid for citizens in Yemen.
